chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
factorial_cancel: forall n a b : nat, fact n * a = fact n * b -> a = b
p: nat
Hp: p <> 0
expo_p_cancel: forall n a b : nat, expo n p * a = expo n p * b -> a = b
phi_Zp_eq: forall n r : nat, 〚 φ n r 〛 = 〚 fact r 〛
Psi_Zp_eq: forall n : nat, 〚 Ψ n 〛 = expoZp n 〚 fact (p - 1) 〛
Hprime: prime p
phi_Zp_invertible: forall n r : nat, r < p -> Zp_invertible Hp 〚 φ n r 〛
Psi_Zp_invertible: forall n : nat, Zp_invertible Hp 〚 Ψ n 〛
k0: nat
K: nat
k: nat
n0: nat
N: nat
n: nat
Hn: n = N * p + n0
Hk: k = K * p + k0
H1: K < N
H2: n0 < k0
Hk0: k0 < p
H3: p - (k0 - n0) < p
H4: S (N - 1) = N
H5: N - 1 = K + (N - (K + 1))
H6: N = K + 1 + (N - (K + 1))
HNK: N - K = S (N - (K + 1))
Hkn: k <= n
Hnk: n - k = (N - (K + 1)) * p + (p - (k0 - n0))

Goal:
fact K * fact (N - (K + 1)) * φ K k0 * Ψ K * φ (N - (K + 1)) (p - (k0 - n0)) * Ψ (N - (K + 1)) * binomial n k = p * fact N * φ N n0 * Ψ N

Premises:
Notation expoZp := (mscal (Zp_mult Hp) Op)
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
binomial = fix binomial (n p : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => match p with | 0 => 1 | S _ => 0 end | S n0 => match p with | 0 => 1 | S p0 => binomial n0 p0 + binomial n0 (S p0) end end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments binomial (_ _)%nat_scope
fact = fix fact (n : nat) : nat := match n with | 0 => 1 | S n0 => S n0 * fact n0 end : nat -> nat Arguments fact _%nat_scope
Zp_invertible : forall p : nat, p <> 0 -> Z_Zp p -> Prop
prime = fun p : nat => p <> 1 /\ (forall q : nat, divides q p -> q = 1 \/ q = p) : nat -> Prop Arguments prime _%nat_scope
Notation expo := power

binomial_wo_p : forall n N n0 k K k0 : nat, n = N * p + n0 -> k = K * p + k0 -> K <= N ->...-> Π k0 (fun i : nat => i + (K * p + 1)) * Π K (fun i : nat => Π (p - 1) (fun i0 : nat => i0 + (i * p + 1))) * Π (n0 - k0) (fun i : nat => i + ((N - K) * p + 1)) * Π (N - K) (fun i : nat => Π (p - 1) (fun i0 : nat => i0 + (i * p + 1))) * binomial n k = binomial N K * Π n0 (fun i : nat => i + (N * p + 1)) * Π N (fun i : nat => Π (p - 1) (fun i0 : nat => i0 + (i * p + 1)))
mprod_factorial_euclid : forall n r : nat, fact (n * p + r) = expo n p * fact n * Π r (fun i : nat => i + (n * p + 1)) * Π n (fun i : nat => Π (p - 1) (fun i0 : nat => i0 + (i * p + 1)))
mprod_factorial_mult : forall n : nat, fact (n * p) = expo n p * fact n * Π n (fun i : nat => Π (p - 1) (fun i0 : nat => i0 + (i * p + 1)))
Newton_nat : forall a b n : nat, expo n (a + b) = msum add 0 (S n) (fun i : nat => binomial n i * expo (n - i) a * expo i b)
mprod_factorial_Zp : forall i n : nat, 〚 Π n (fun i0 : nat => i0 + (i * p + 1)) 〛 = 〚 fact n 〛
binomial_spec : forall n p : nat, p <= n -> fact n = binomial n p * fact p * fact (n - p)
binomial_thm : forall n p : nat, p <= n -> fact n = binomial n p * fact p * fact (n - p)
bezout_rel_prime_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> is_gcd p q 1 -> {a : nat & {b : nat | a * p + b * q = 1 + p * q /\ a <= q /\ b <= p}}
binomial_le : forall n p : nat, p <= n -> binomial n p = div (fact n) (fact p * fact (n - p))
div_prop : forall q p n r : nat, q = n * p + r -> r < p -> div q p = n
Nat.mul_sub_distr_r : forall n m p : nat, (n - m) * p = n * p - m * p
Nat.add_sub_assoc : forall n m p : nat, p <= m -> n + (m - p) = n + m - p
bezout_generalized_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> {a : nat & {b : nat & {g : nat & {l : nat & {u : nat & {v : nat | a * p + b * q = g + l /\ is_gcd p q g /\ is_lcm p q l /\ p = u * g /\ q = v * g /\ a <= v /\ b <= u}}}}}}
bezout_sc : forall p q a b m : nat, a * p + b * q = 1 + m -> divides p m \/ divides q m -> is_gcd p q 1
Nat.sub_add_distr : forall n m p : nat, n - (m + p) = n - m - p
power_plus : forall p a b : nat, expo (a + b) p = expo a p * expo b p
euclid : forall n d : nat, d <> 0 -> {q : nat & {r : nat | n = q * d + r /\ r < d}}
Nat.add_sub_eq_nz : forall n m p : nat, p <> 0 -> n - m = p -> m + p = n
Zp_invert_stable : forall (p : nat) (Hp : p <> 0) (Hp' : prime p) (n : nat), 1 < n < p - 1 -> exists m : nat, 1 < m < p - 1 /\ nat2Zp Hp m = Zp_invert Hp Hp' (nat2Zp Hp n)
Nat.mul_add_distr_l : forall n m p : nat, n * (m + p) = n * m + n * p

```coq
assert (fact K = binomial N K * fact (N - K)).
{
  apply binomial_spec.
  apply H1.
}
rewrite H5 in H.
rewrite H4 in H.
rewrite HNK in H.
rewrite HN in H.
rewrite H6 in H.
rewrite mult_plus_distr_r in H.
rewrite mult_plus_distr_r in H.
rewrite mult_plus_distr_r in H.
rewrite mult_plus_distr_r in H.
rewrite <- Nat.add_sub_assoc in H.
rewrite <- Hn in H.
rewrite <- Hk in H.
rewrite Nat.sub_add_distr in H.
rewrite Nat.mul_sub_distr_r in H.
rewrite <- mult_assoc in H.
rewrite mult_comm in H.
rewrite mult_assoc in H.
rewrite <- H in H.
rewrite Hk0 in H.
rewrite mult_comm in H.
rewrite <- mult_assoc in H.
rewrite bezout_rel_prime_lt with (r:=k0) in H.
- destruct H as [u [v [H7 _]]].
  rewrite div_prop with (r:=N) in H7.
  + replace (K * p + k0) with (p * K + k0) in H7 by auto.
    replace (N * p + n0) with (p * N + n0) in H7 by auto.
    replace (K * p) with (p * K) in H7 by auto.
    replace (N - K) with (S (N - (K + 1))) in H7 by auto.
    replace (K + 1) with (S K) in H7 by auto.
    replace (n0 - k0) with (p - (k0 - n0)) in H7 by auto.
    replace (N - (K + 1)) with (p - (K + 1 * p + (n0 - k0) + 1)) in H7 by auto.
    replace (N * p) with (p * N) in H7 by auto.
    auto.
  + auto.
- auto.
- auto.
Qed.  
```
